image_requirements.description: Show the products in a bright and fresh environment to convey high-quality, clean products.
Photograph each unique side of the product package. The 'Front View' should highlight the predominant brand labeling.
Ensure products are evenly lit and colors correctly represent the item, avoiding flare or spill.
Items should be clipped from the background, cleaning any dirt, dust, or stickers.
Be selective with props, avoiding distractions from the product.
Diversity is encouraged; use natural expressions and engage models with the product.

summary: The page outlines guidelines for image styling, emphasizing high-quality settings, specific angles and views, effective lighting, post-production editing, prop selection, and model usage to showcase products authentically.
